tool_description: Estimates expected wait time for calls based on queue position, agent performance metrics, and historical data.

agent_id.description: Agent ID for which to estimate wait time

call_category.description: Category of the call affecting handling time

error_messages: Invalid agent ID: Agent not found in performance database.
Invalid queue position: Position must be a positive integer.
Historical data insufficient: Not enough data to provide accurate estimate.
Agent performance data unavailable: Unable to access agent metrics for calculation.
usage: Provide agent_id, queue_position, call_category, and current_timestamp to estimate expected wait time for the caller.

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of the estimate (low, medium, high)

factors_considered.description: Factors included in the wait time calculation

alternative_wait_times.description: Wait times if transferred to alternative agents
